name: RigoleStp Hijack Of The African Mafia
name_original: RigoleStp Hijack Of The African Mafia
description:
Defeat the African Mafia in this absurd platformer! :D

How To Play

Arrows to move, jump and shoot and space to start.

The Story

RigoleStp is on a trip to Africa, and learns about a secret organization. It's your turn to go and beat them!

Other Random Things

If the Game takes some time to load then just wait, it's normal.

The full OST is available for free on SoundCloud.

It's my greatest Game for the moment, enjoy! :D
